distribution.description: Creates Cloudfront distribution and other needed pieces for connecting to Route53 and an S3 bucket

aliases.description: The name of the codebuild project. If not present this name will be auto-generated.

target_s3_bucket.description: The dictionary of runtime versions you need to build your app. If not set, this will default to {"nodejs": 10}. See a list of possible values here: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/codebuild/latest/userguide/runtime-versions.html

default_root_object.description: Commands installing required libraries/packages before a build is run.

target_ec2_instance.description: The size of the codebuild container. Can speed up builds if you expect them to take a long time.

target_load_balancer.description: The path to the index document for the website

origin_path.description: The path that handles 4XX class errors. Can be the same as the index_document

origin_shield.description: A prefix to add in front of the s3 object

custom_origin_headers.description: A prefix to add in front of the s3 object

force_https.description: Key-value pairs to attach as tags to the s3 bucket

allowed_ssl_protocols.description: The domain name for your website

price_class.description: The price class for the CloudFront distribution. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/PriceClass.html

web_acl_id.description: The domain name for your website

logs_s3_bucket.description: The s3 bucket to store logs in

logs_include_cookies.description: Whether to include cookies in the logs

logs_prefix.description: The object prefix to add to the log files in s3

key_group_ids.description: A list of key groups that CloudFront can use to validate signed URLs or signed cookies

allowed_methods.description: The allowed methods on this cloudfront distribution

cached_methods.description: The cached methods on this cloudfront distribution

cache_policy_id.description: The ID of the cache policy to use for this cloudfront distribution. Pass this or cache_policy_name, but not both. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/using-managed-cache-policies.html

cache_policy_name.description: The name of the managed cache policy to use for this cloudfront distribution. Pass this or cache_policy_name, but not both. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudFront/latest/DeveloperGuide/using-managed-cache-policies.html

tags.description: A set of key-value pairs to attach to this API Gateway as tags

codebuild_project_arn.description: The ARN of the codebuild project

codebuild_project_name.description: The name of the codebuild project

S3.description: Props from the S3 component deployed

Route53.description: Props from the route53 component deployed, if there is one

comment.description: A comment to add to the OAI

s3_id.description: The S3 canonical user ID for the OAI
